programme.title: A Merry Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A wedding planner pulled in for a last-minute royal wedding on Christmas Day is shocked to discover the groom is the alluring stranger she met before.

programme.title: Christmas Lovers Anonymous
programme.desc: A best-selling author hides her love for Christmas after an ugly break up, but finds love again when she joins a website for people who are crazy about Christmas.

programme.title: Royally Yours, This Christmas
programme.desc: A royal prince falls in love with a single mother and hotel housekeeper at Christmastime after he mistakes her for a wealthy hotel guest.

programme.title: A Merry Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A wedding planner pulled in for a last-minute royal wedding on Christmas Day is shocked to discover the groom is the alluring stranger she met before.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica relives an unusual love affair from her university days.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Katie maneuvers her way into a book deal with River Rock.

programme.title: Being Erica
programme.desc: Erica realizes that her need to control might be contributing to the downfall of her relationship with Ethan.

programme.title: A Match in Manhattan
programme.desc: When Celeste loses her teaching job, she becomes an au-pair for an infamous New York property tycoon.

programme.title: Falling for the Manny
programme.desc: When single mom Alice finds herself up for partner at her firm, there's just one obstacle: the annual partners family retreat. Alice hires her sister's manny, Jacob, to help look after her 9-year-old daughter while they're away.

programme.title: Love By Design
programme.desc: Broken-hearted Brooke Yeardley makes her 30th birthday wish on the vision board she made as a teen. As her wishes start coming true, she finds out that life doesn't always follow a plan.

programme.title: Scented With Love
programme.desc: Rosalie returns home after training as a perfumer in Paris and tries to rent a store to sell her own perfume. The only space available is shared by the local furniture store, which is owned by the previously geeky-now handsome Jason.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas Pairing
programme.desc: After a bad review from a food critic, renowned chef Grace Cooke returns home for Christmas and reconnects with her roots.

programme.title: A Perfect Christmas Carol
programme.desc: When a fiercely independent pastry chef agrees to accompany her hunky dream man home for the holidays, things quickly devolve as he reverts into a momma's boy and she finds herself caught in a tug-of-war with his smothering mother.

programme.title: Christmas With Felicity
programme.desc: A struggling baker returns to her hometown to try to get Christmas spirit back.

programme.title: Christmas in Scotland
programme.desc: On vacation in Scotland, a New York installation designer is tasked with helping a small, rural community compete in a "Best Christmas Village" festival. She is forced to work with a wealthy, heir who sees Christmas as an inconvenience.

programme.title: A Vineyard Christmas
programme.desc: Heather is determined to create the perfect Christmas episode by featuring a unique winery from her hometown.
